details.text: Chrome extension for creating and managing a list of movies and TV shows to watch. Adding meta data to movies and advanced search. Api NodeJs (NestJS) with integration with smotret-anime.ru and api.themoviedb.org.
A page inside an extension, with a catalog and search
Movie search page from bookmarks
Opening a widget on a website with a movie to add a movie
Add popup with editing metadata
A project for learning songs in English.
Using the browser api: SpeechSynthesis, the translation of the line from the song and the English version of the reading are pronounced.
The user is then given the option to repeat the English version.
And with the help of SpeechRecognition and Levenshtein distance method, the accuracy of what is said with the lyrics is analyzed.
Authorization A001 / admin
CRM system for managing call lists with real-time data update and statistics module.
Realtime data update is done based on firebase. The backend was originally written in php, but then migrated to nodejs to speed up work.
A basket of goods, with the ability to edit the properties of items, with automatic price recalculation. Compiled into WebComponent for integration into any site.

crm-lang.title: CRM schools for learning foreign languages

details.text: Frontend - angular. Backend on a self-written framework in php, with Swagger for api documentation.
Dashboard with statistics
Personal account for a student, teacher, group, corporate client.
Add, remove and edit users.
5 user roles, with different access and capabilities: Administrator, Manager, Corporate client, Educator, Student.
Teachers and managers have the opportunity to keep records of homework and assess the performance of the assignment for students, with a comment from the teacher and summary statistics.
Attendance log screen.
Convenient timetable screens for groups, teacher and student.

In our profession, it is important to estimate the time spent on a task and measure the actual time spent in order to make predictions more accurately. In addition, I must provide a report on how long which task took me..

For this, I created for myself such a convenient tool for keeping track of time. I made it as simple and convenient as possible (and in a short time). With each user action, the data is saved in the localStorage of the browser (so that you do not accidentally close the tab without losing data).
A small project, completed in 3 hours, for keeping a list of watched films. Adaptable for mobile devices.

pay-form.title: Payment form with validation and adaptation for mobile, in angular 6.

details.text: Payment form with validation and adaptation for mobile, in angular 6.
A circular multi-level slider with support for an unlimited number of levels and a very large number of elements (tested on 500,000 elements), with lazy loading of elements as needed.

A prototype of a bouquet editor application that allows you to select multiple flowers, group them into a bouquet, attach stickers to them, and write a note to the bouquet. As the bouquet is issued, the cost is automatically calculated, after registration, a photo of the received bouquet is sent to the administrator.
Crm for accounting for sales and maintaining a balance of store goods.
